kv2.9:9.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv2.9:9.2: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ, vicikicchaṃ, sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:9.3: Catubhāgaṃ sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ na sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ sattakkhattuparamo kolaṃkolo ekabījī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme … pe …
kv2.9:9.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato catubhāgaṃ na ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti?
kv2.9:10.6: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ, vicikicchaṃ, sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:10.7: Catubhāgaṃ sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ na sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ sattakkhattuparamo kolaṃkolo ekabījī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme … pe …
kv2.9:10.11: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, catubhāgaṃ na ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti?
kv2.9:11.1: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv2.9:11.2: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:11.3: Catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv2.9:11.11: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:11.12: Catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv2.9:12.1: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv2.9:12.2: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:12.3: Catubhāgaṃ anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ antarāparinibbāyī … pe …
kv2.9:12.8: uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, catubhāgaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv2.9:13.6: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:13.7: Catubhāgaṃ anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ antarāparinibbāyī … pe …
kv2.9:13.12: uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, catubhāgaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv2.9:14.1: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv2.9:14.2: Rūparāgaṃ, arūparāgaṃ, mānaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, avijjaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:14.3: Catubhāgaṃ arahā, catubhāgaṃ na arahā, catubhāgaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ vītarāgo … pe …
kv2.9:14.8: katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ … pe …
kv2.9:14.10: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, catubhāgaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?
kv2.9:15.4: Rūparāgaṃ, arūparāgaṃ, mānaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, avijjaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.
kv2.9:15.5: Catubhāgaṃ arahā, catubhāgaṃ na arahā, catubhāgaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ vītarāgo … pe …
kv2.9:15.9: katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvitabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ … pe …
kv2.9:15.11: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, catubhāgaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?
kv2.9:16.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:17.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo maggaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:17.3: Dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:17.6: maggaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:17.10: nirodhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:18.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—
kv2.9:18.4: Maggaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—
kv2.9:18.9: nirodhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—
kv2.9:18.12: Maggaṃ dakkhanto “paṭipannako”ti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—
kv2.9:19.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—
kv2.9:19.9: nirodhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—
kv2.9:20.1: ☒ Dukkhe diṭṭhe cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni hontīti?
kv2.9:21.1: Rūpakkhandhe aniccato diṭṭhe pañcakkhandhā aniccato diṭṭhā hontīti?
kv2.9:22.1: Cakkhāyatane aniccato diṭṭhe dvādasāyatanāni aniccato diṭṭhāni hontīti?
kv2.9:23.1: Cakkhudhātuyā aniccato diṭṭhāya aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo aniccato diṭṭhā hontīti?
kv2.9:24.1: Cakkhundriye aniccato diṭṭhe bāvīsatindriyāni aniccato diṭṭhāni hontīti?
kv2.9:26.5: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto;
kv2.9:26.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā, na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho”ti.
kv2.9:30.4: “sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ—
kv2.9:30.5: ‘yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passati;
kv2.9:30.6: yo dukkhasamudayaṃ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passati;
kv2.9:30.7: yo dukkhanirodhaṃ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhasamudayampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passati;
kv2.9:30.8: yo dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhasamudayampi passati, dukkhanirodhampi passatī’”ti.
kv2.9:34.4: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
kv2.9:34.5: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
